page.title: 18The Weekend in Rowan's Home
page.content: My name is Rowan Boys and at weekends our family tries to do as much as it can. Sometimes, my brother, who has left school, rides his motor bike back to the old farm where we used to live. My other brother, who has also left school, goes to work in the local pub, The Town Crier. If the weather is fine, Mum, Dad, my sister and I, go to a nearby nursery to get some plants for our garden. On Sunday mornings we sometimes go to church, then my sister and I are allowed to play out. Then at tea-time, my sister and I, go to our friend Angela's house. We watch films on their video and play some games on their computer. We stay out usually till 9.30p.m., but we have been out as late as 10.30p.m.
